keyword.name: StateMachine
keyword.desc: The state machine cover the whole program and is in the real ThingML called StateChart.

keyword.name: State
keyword.desc: States are a subsections inside a StateMachine which are used to communicate and execute commands.

keyword.name: init
keyword.desc: Init is used to choose which state is the start state.

keyword.name: final
keyword.desc: Final is the opposite of the init-state and let you choose which state(s) can be the finalizing state.
Each state uses a transition to communicate and transfer data between them. Each transition are weighted.
